alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Craven, southeastern Beaufort and Pamlico Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Aurora Ferry Terminal to near Grantsboro to near Fairfield Harbour. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lowland, Florence, Janeiro, Grantsboro, Royal, Whortonsville, South Creek, Maribel, Nc Pamlico, Merritt, Fairfield Harbour, Aurora Ferry Terminal, Minnesott Beach Ferry, Bayboro, Alliance, Arapahoe, Aurora, Minnesott Beach, Stonewall and Vandemere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
